item.title: The Underappreciated Art of Capturing Novel Data
item.description: While the internet is an endless source of free data, everyone is training on the same tired datasets, and theyâ€™ve likely got more years of practice. Building a novel dataset tailored to your problem can be a game-changer (if done right).
